nodes.caption: Decision or Strategy Alternatives [Alternatives decision that can utilize to influence the output of the problem system]
Problem Owner: Decision Actor [The person/institution who ultimately owns the problem and beneficiated from the solution]
Input Factors [Data requirements and boundaries to make the model running]
System Representation Diagram [A diagram as the representative model of the systems, such as Causal Loop Diagram]
Output [A translation of system goals into evaluable model parameters]
System Goals [The ideal performance that the problem system need to achieve to solve the problem]
Stakeholders [People or institutions who are also affected by the problem that can influence the problem owner and has interests in the system goals]
